commitResults.messageTitle: Bug fix for background highlight and point highlight overwriting each other (#2006)
Add preview for background highlight points (#2011)

commitResults.messageBody:
* Reduce vertical margin of sync panel

* Adjust some margin and size to make it look nicer

* Adjust margins

* Restore image size, reduce image margins

* Add RestoreClipboardAfterAction to Spotlight

* Restore clipboard after blurring actions

* Return 0 instead of null after adding spotlight effect

* Restore clipboard after recolor actions

* Shift clipboard restoration for spotlight to action handler

* Restore clipboard after agenda lab actions

* Restore clipboard after synclab actions & use ClipboardRestoreSuccess constant

* SyncLabShapeStorage: Remove trailing whitespace in line 138

* ActionFramework.ZoomLab: Restore clipboard after actions

* ZoomLab: Fix bug introduced by restoring clipboard

* Spotlight.cs: Remove redundant import

* ZoomLab: Retreive current presentation and slide from ActionHandler instead

Co-authored-by: Bryan Lew <blewjy@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: yuhongherald <yuhongherald@gmail.com>

commitResults.messageTitle: #1370 paste into group exception after undo (#2015)
#2002 replace with clipboard lose image quality (#2013)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Replace with clipboard: prevent degrading formats from being applied to pictures

* ReplaceWithClipboard: add tests to verify non-degradation of pictures

* PasteLabFT: uncomment erroneously commented out tests

* PasteLabFT: Refactor AssertNotSame

commitResults.messageTitle: #1918 UI bug in E-Learning Lab: Text overflow cannot scroll (#1998)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Create ShapeNameWidthConverter

This commit creates a class that helps calculate the exact width for
the textblock that displays the ShapeName for eLearningLab's side
panel.

* Allow auto wrapping of names for eLearningLab

* Minor style fixes

* Remove unnecessary naming

* Replace repeated value with constant

* Remove unused directive from ShapeNameWidthConverter.cs

commitResults.messageTitle: #2022 unable to run tests on older powerpoint versions (#2026)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Remove Test configuration file from git

* Revert back missing assembly config file

* Update documentation to show how to set up test properties
